title: Holidays on the River Yarra
creator_credit: Jungle Pictures, Film Victoria, Fiona Cochrane and Leo Berkeley
brief_description: Mick and Eddie, (Craig Adams and Luke Elliot), grow up tough in the big city. Typical teenagers, on the lookout for adventure, they struggle to succeed in a world of violence and industrial decay. To build their dream, it will take everything they’ve got in their fight against the system.
